name: ##Gladiators
author: Kirames
notes:
Gladiator beasts are very strong right now. Climbed from L1-KOG with this deck. Triple ECON did well vs CA and triple floodgate worked very well vs REZ to slow them down and prevent AMA plays, I stopped seeing Hazy so i took out SRH. Cyclone and Gyokkou were my tech cards against Ninja but proved useful in most match-ups.

Shout out to the 2 bamboo players who went 1st and bricked on my 5 game streak to KOG as well as the final boss who chose to surrender turn 1.
